description: Paris becomes the second French city to order bars to close again as infections continue to rise.
title: Coronavirus: Paris to shut bars and raise alert to maximum
title_page: Coronavirus: Paris to shut bars and raise alert to maximum - BBC News
maintext: Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin acknowledged closing bars would be difficult for Parisians. "We are French, we love to drink, to eat, to live, to smile and to kiss each other," he told French TV channel LCI and Europe 1 on Sunday.
